com.yantra.ycp.japi.util

Interface YCPSSOManager


  • public interface YCPSSOManager
    This interface needs to be implemented only if a single signon mechanism is required within the application. If single signon is enabled, set yfs.security.singlesignon.enabled property to 'Y' and set yfs.login.singlesignon.class property to the name of Java class which implements this interface. These properties are defined in yfs.properties file.


    Example:
       import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
   import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
   import com.yantra.ycp.japi.util.YCPSSOManager;
   public class MySingleSignonManagerImpl implements YCPSSOManager {
       public String getUserData(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse res) throws Exception {
           // Get the userID from the single signon application
           // Let us assume that SSO provider has set the user id in HttpServletRequest
                          return req.getRemoteUser();
       }
   }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getUserData(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
      This method is invoked by the security manager when a session is timed out.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserData

        java.lang.String getUserData(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is invoked by the security manager when a session is timed out. It is invoked only if the yfs.security.singlesignon.enabled property is set to 'Y' in the application properties file. This should read the user data from where it is stored in the single signon application and pass it back to the security manager for automatic login and session re-creation. req Http request object res Http response object String containing current userid Exception if there is an exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
